body_html: You've linked to the Dockerfile for 9.0-devel-cudnn7-ubuntu16.04, and you are using 9.0-devel-ubuntu17.04 as your base image. Both are available on the dockerhub, but the latter does not have cudnn in it, the reason being that cudnn does not officially support ubuntu 17.04. It can run there, in all probability, but nobody has tested it.

body: You've linked to the Dockerfile for 9.0-devel-cudnn7-ubuntu16.04, and you are using 9.0-devel-ubuntu17.04 as your base image. Both are available on the dockerhub, but the latter does not have cudnn in it, the reason being that cudnn does not officially support ubuntu 17.04. It can run there, in all probability, but nobody has tested it.
